description: Double attack speed for 10 seconds. Massively increases DPS temporarily.

icon_color: Shoot additional projectiles down adjacent lanes for 10 seconds. Grants 3-lane coverage.

description: Gain +1 projectile for the rest of combat. Effect stacks with multiple pickups.
Rolling explosion deals 40 damage across the entire map. Clears weak enemies.
Capital ship fires devastating 150 damage beam at pickup ship's current target.
Deploys drone that heals pickup ship for 15 hull per second for 10 seconds (150 total).
Deploys drone that restores pickup ship's shields at 25 per second for 10 seconds (250 total).

icon_color: Gain complete invincibility for 10 seconds. Immune to all damage.
Reveal all cloaked and stealth units for 30 seconds. Counters Scout ships.
Double all combat rewards from ship destruction for 10 seconds. Maximizes resource gain.
